amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to reauthorize the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program for another 10 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
